Review_title: LIfe is tough on the reserve
Review_Text: SpoilerI was surprised at how good and authentic this documentary was. It has a number of very relevant themesstruggling to make a life on the remote reserve in Wyominggender violence against womenteenage pregnancythe lure of the city (in this case, Denver)alcohol and drug abuseYou know there are problems when you see a magnetic tag on the refrigerator for suicide prevention. One of the woman wants to be a bareback horse race rider. She is only moderately successful at this - and comes to terms with her limitations - and with the gay friendship she has formed with another woman. It's a real slice of life - with no sugar-coating.
